li.label: Flowing Might
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} harnesses the flowing power of water, striking with calm precision but overwhelming force. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks break through defenses with the relentless power of a raging river.

li.label: Rushing Current
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the swiftness of a rushing river, striking with incredible speed and precision. {PAWN_pronoun} avoids attacks effortlessly, leaving nothing but the gentle ebb and flow of {PAWN_possessive} wake.

li.label: Tidal Tamer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} radiates a calming presence, like the stillness of the ocean, drawing even the fiercest creatures to {PAWN_possessive} command. {PAWN_pronoun} bends the will of beasts, controlling them with the serenity of flowing water.

li.label: Endless Flow
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} endures hardship like the endless tide, flowing around obstacles and never breaking. Even in the face of adversity, {PAWN_pronoun} presses on, unwavering in {PAWN_possessive} resolve.

li.label: Flowing Defense
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} adapts to the flow of battle, resisting toxins and filth as the river shapes its path around obstacles. {PAWN_pronoun} remains unyielding, emerging from even the harshest conditions calm and intact.

li.label: Ocean’s Harvest
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} uses water’s nourishing properties to craft meals that sustain the body and mind. {PAWN_pronoun} creates food that rejuvenates and replenishes all who stand beside {PAWN_pronoun}, much like the sea provides abundance.

li.label: Tidal Influence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes a calming aura, like the tides that shape the shore. {PAWN_pronoun} draws others in with {PAWN_possessive} peaceful yet commanding presence, fostering loyalty and unity.

li.label: Soothing Current
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heals with the gentle but persistent touch of water, bringing comfort and relief to the wounded. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures that allies recover swiftly, using water’s nurturing power to restore vitality.

li.label: Ocean’s Plenty
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} understands the balance of water’s power, fostering growth wherever {PAWN_pronoun} goes. Like the tides that replenish the earth, {PAWN_pronoun} nurtures the land, ensuring bountiful harvests and prosperity.
